question:
With y dollars, 5 oranges can be bought. If all oranges cost the same, how many dollars do 25 oranges cost, in terms of y?
(A) \(\frac{y}{5}\)
(B) \(y\)
(C) \(y + 5\)
(D) \(5y\)
(E) \(25y\)
